key.name: trigger-key
key.description: Scale a window down to a portion of it's size.

key.name: reset-key
key.summary: Reset the window to original size
key.description: Resets the currently focused window to original size

key.name: triggerscreen-key
key.description: Scale a window down to a ration of the screen size. Respectively half, a third or a sixth of the screen.

key.name: dec-button
key.description: Reduces the scale factor making the window smaller.

key.name: inc-button
key.description: Increase the scale factor making the window bigger.

key.name: animtime
key.description: Duration of the animation in milliseconds. (1 - 10000)

key.name: interval
key.description: The number to divide the scale factor by or multiply it with when (respectively) increasing and decreasing the scale level manually. Higher number means finer changes. (0.100 - 0.999)
